tags: None
review: I went there to get my pregnancy confirmation. Doctor explained the risks and how to proceed further. Waiting for the blood report now

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: family planning and full contraceptive services,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I had been went through the treatment for pregnancy under Dr.Kumudini.devi. It was successful in first attempt itself. She is very friendly and motivated me all along the treatment. She is readily available in her clinic and available in phone and whatsapp in case of any urgency. She is having the rich experience and knowledge, which guided me throughout the journey of pregnancy. And finally I delivered baby under her safest hand. Our deepest heartfelt thanks and gratitude to Mam for facilitating joy and happyness  in our life in the form of baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We contacted the doctor through Practo as soon as we found out that we are going to have a baby. She was very helpful and guided us well through our entire pregnancy journey.

Some days before she was due my wife's water broke and we had to rush to the hospital in an emergency. Dr. Kumudini immediately reached the hospital and attended to my wife. She successfully delivered a healthy baby the same afternoon and made sure both the mother and baby were fine.

We would like to thank Dr Kumudini in holding our hand through this wonderful journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited doctor kumudini based on a friends recommendation.. little did i know that she would be my go to doctor ..i conceived the same month and recently delivered a baby girl .. My pregnancy was a smooth ride all thanks to Dr kumudini.. she is very calm and explains everything in detail.An example of  her level of selflessness is when she was pregnant and delivered a baby and was back in no time to ensure ppl who depend on her are taken care by her and not redirected anywhere else causing additional stress to the patients

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: She was busy talking to other people and dint send any prescription inspite of asking her for it. She seems distracted with other conversations in her room father than being focused on me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I‚Äôve known the doctor even before my pregnancy began. Dr.Devi helped me understand the whole process of a pregnancy. Before my pregnancy began, she did a through check up and recommended a medicine. Took that fr a couple of months and I finally conceived. After that it was a smooth ride all through till my baby was delivered and post delivery also she was just awesome. She is a very polite and friendly doctor who explains everything in detail and is very vigilant always. I would recommend her happily to any couple who is planning to have a baby or is in process or to any woman who needs a gynaecologist.
She has been always available for me on call / on WhatsApp for any of my queries during this pandemic situation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was lucky to find Dr. Kumudini Devi, she is an excellent professional. She explained the Hysterectomy   BSO  procedure in detail and put me at ease. She patiently answered all my queries. Due to my Endometriosis condition she had explained beforehand that there's a need to go for open surgery if any  complications are found through Laparoscopic surgery. That's what happened during surgery. I was taken good care at hospital and got discharged in 3 days. Now I am recovering well and all my pains have disappeared. Many  Thanks to Dr. Kumudini and team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My wife delivered in Rainbow hospital on May 12th. Dr. Kumudhini was our consulting Doctor and she was always available for any queries or help. Due to the covid situation she told us about the process being followed at the hospital. She told us about the need to do the covid test done before hand so that the process in the hospital is smooth. Throughout the pregnancy she was supportive and helpful with the treatment. She explained the pregnancy process and the care that needs to be taken. After the baby's delivery she explained the post - parental care that needs to be care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Doctor Kumudini Devi for my Mother in law, and the Doctor is always approachable with her calm and pleasant nature with a smiling face..she always explains the details and make sure we understand things. She insisted us to have periodic checks even we forget sometimes inorder to make sure patient's well being.She took time even on sundays and visit hospital to check if everything is fine after surgery.She has a great humanitarian side as well, that's what we expect much from a doctor.Doctors like Kumudini devi are blessing for our society and I wish such tribe increase and prosper in the coming years!! I could give 100 starts to her!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi All, After eight years of my struggle finaly i got conceived during the begining of this year. Dr Kumudini Devi was my consultant from the begining and she took care of me very well and was involved personally in shaping up during this period of 39 weeks. She is able Gynaecologist not willing to take any risk and took care of me with constant follow up. All through  moments of my life I always felt if my mother was alive it would have been great during this struggle. But Dr Kumudini was caring and comforting and I felt my mother  back again.
She advised me  at the right time  during all these weeks and I am proud mother today. My daughter born two days ago. No words will replace my gratitude to her and I am very very happy üôè
reply_text: Thank you so much Priya.. god bless you all

Kumudini mam has been an amazing Gynec

She has guided us rightly and educated me on how to handle the pregnancy as I had developed GDM in the early trimester itself. review:
I highly recommend Doctor Kumudini for pregnancy. I consulted Doctor Kumudini for my pregnancy. It was high risk pregnancy, with my age on higher side and other issues as well cropping up during the pregnancy period. However, she not only managed all those medical things, she was patient enough to listen and clarify my  each and every doubt. She explained me the reason behind her every decision. Also, she is very approachable and is always available. By God's grace and with Doctor Kumudini's treatment and support, I delivered a healthy baby. 
Highly recommend Doctor Kumudini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As we are new to Bangalore and not having any references of gynecologist, I have searched in Practo for a gynic and we have visited doctor 'Kumudini Devi' madam for my wife regarding Bartholin cyst problem and she did a surgery & removed the cyst. She was very friendly, very cool, listened to every thing what we said in a very calm & patiently and acted in a very fast manner to rectify the problem. Now my wife is fine without any issues/complications. Even she understood us financially and helped us to choose the Hospital for surgery and she took the initiative to enquire the respective hospital for the insurance claim.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** *** **** * ***** **** *** ** *** **** **** We had a normal delivery with a healthy baby. Now issue at all. 

Earlier we were consulting with diff Dr. she asked us to do lots of test at 6th Months ( after 5th-month check-up ) and she uses to refer us some hospital to do some very high test with a warning if we don't do it we might be abortion the baby and she said that has to do with a week and cost around 20-26k. We were in full tension then I checked with my colleague. She suggested us St john hospital Bangalore for a 2nd opinion and luckily we met with Dr. Kumudini *** *** ** * *** *** **. 

After met with Dr. Kumudini,  I and my wife felt relax and happy.
reply_text: I just shared my lil knowledge with u guys.. that is all.. thank you so much üòä

review: I was apprehensive as it was my first gynaec consult. I had heard of docs being judgemental and reprimanding. But Dr. Kumudini put me at ease. She is patient-friendly and did not ask unnecessary probing questions and put the focus on my needs instead. I will recommend Dr. Kumudini to my friends. We need more gynaecs like her who are thoroughly professional and makes the patient feel comfortable.

tags: Wait time,
review: we booked for 4 pm slot but same was rescheduled to 6 pm. we were there on time but doctor didn't turned up till 6:20. In this covid era, doctor should take care of time slots committed.
reply_text: Dear patient as I had emergency surgery I had to reschedule your appointment. Time slot is between 6-6:30pm. As it is operation on a person we cannot fix a fixed time. We can only say on avarage. That is the reason we keep half an hour time period. Hope you can understand.
